\ 00065 appID = applicationID; \ 00066 xlicense->CheckMasterCreation(xpath, xlicenseID, appID, expirationseconds); \ 00067 } 00068 00069 00070 #ifdef XLICENSE_ACTIVE 00071 00072 #define CHECKLICENSEFULLLOCAL(xlicense, xpath, applicationID) { \ 00073 XLICENSEID xlicenseID; \ 00074 XSTRING appID; \ 00075 XBUFFER license(); \ 00076 appID = applicationID; \ 00077 bool status = xlicense->GenerateMachineID(xlicenseID); \ 00078 if(status) status = xlicense->Generate(xlicenseID, &appID); \ 00079 if(status) status = xlicense->LoadFromFile(xpath, appID, &license); \ 00080 if(status) status = license.Compare(xlicense->Get()); \ 00081 if(!status) xlicense->SetEvent(XLICENSEXEVENT_TYPE_INVALID); \ 00082 } 00083 00084 #define CHECKLICENSEFULLLOCALEXPIRE(xlicense, xpath, applicationID) { \ 00085 XLICENSEID xlicenseID; \ 00086 XSTRING appID; \ 00087 XSTRING expireddate; \ 00088 XBUFFER license(); \ 00089 XTIME xtimeexpired; \ 00090 XDATETIME* xtimeactual; \ 00091 appID = applicationID; \ 00092 bool status = xlicense->GenerateMachineID(xlicenseID); \ 00093 if(status) status = xlicense->Generate(xlicenseID, &appID); \ 00094 if(status) status = xlicense->LoadFromFile(xpath, appID, &license, &expireddate); \ 00095 if(status) status = license.Compare(xlicense->Get()); \ 00096 if(!status) xlicense->SetEvent(XLICENSEXEVENT_TYPE_INVALID); \ 00097 GEN_XFACTORY_CREATE(xtimeactual, CreateTime()) \ 00098 if(xtimeactual) \ 00099 { \ 00100 xtimeexpired.GetDateTimeFromString(expireddate, XDATETIME_FORMAT_STANDARD); \ 00101 xtimeactual->Read(); \ 00102 if(xtimeexpired.GetDay() || xtimeexpired.GetMonth() || xtimeexpired.GetYear()) \ 00103 { \ 00104 if(xtimeactual->GetSeconsFromDate() >= xtimeexpired.GetSeconsFromDate()) \ 00105 { \ 00106 xlicense->SetEvent(XLICENSEXEVENT_TYPE_EXPIRED); \ 00107 } \ 00108 } \ 00109 GEN_XFACTORY.DeleteTime(xtimeactual); \ 00110 } \ 00111 } 00112 #else 00113 00114 #define CHECKLICENSEFULLLOCAL(xlicense, xpath, applicationID) // 00115 #define CHECKLICENSEFULLLOCALEXPIRE(xlicense, xpath, applicationID) // 00116 00117 #endif 00118 00119 #pragma endregion 00120 00121 00122 /*---- CLASS ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ 00123 #pragma region CLASS 00124 00125 00126 class XPUBLISHER;
